column3: btw: the new test data was generated using [the existing previous test](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/src/test/sighash_tests.cpp#L107), by adding a few lines that printed the needed data.\n
Looks good to me. Would you mind including the code that was used to generate these tests (perhaps in an #if 0'ed block in sighash_tests.cpp)?\n

Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/81bfb5aebf983f999d3de12ca4adf8cd4c4a8ae0 for binaries and test log.\nThis test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/cu
Perhaps catch and report deserialization errors here?\n
